title: Define System Architecture
description: Design the overall structure of the PersonalCarbonSequestrator device, including hardware and software components.

title: Design the Hardware Components
description: Create detailed designs for each hardware component required in the PersonalCarbonSequestrator device.

title: Design the Software Components
description: Create detailed designs for each software component required in the PersonalCarbonSequestrator device.

title: Develop the User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the PersonalCarbonSequestrator device.

title: Implement the User Interface
description: Code and test the user interface for the PersonalCarbonSequestrator device.

title: Create the Device Enclosure
description: Design and manufacture the enclosure for the PersonalCarbonSequestrator device.

title: Assemble the Device Prototype
description: Assemble the prototype of the PersonalCarbonSequestrator device according to its design.

title: Test the Prototype
description: Conduct functional and performance tests on the prototype of the PersonalCarbonSequestrator device.

title: Iterate on the Design (if necessary)
description: Address any issues found during testing and iterate on the design of the PersonalCarbonSequestrator device.

title: Document the Project
description: Write detailed documentation for the PersonalCarbonSequestrator device, including hardware and software specifications.
